sen.j: 酒井 定隆（さかい さだたか、永享7年（1435年） - 大永2年4月24日 (旧暦)（1522年5月19日））は、室町時代後期から戦国時代 (日本)初期にかけての武将で上総酒井氏の祖とされる人物。
sen.e: Sadataka SAKAI (1435 - May 19, 1522) was a Japanese military commander during the time from the late Muromachi period to the Sengoku period (of Japan), and is believed to be the founder of the Kazusa Sakai clan.

sen.e: There are various views on the reason why the man from Mino Province moved to Kazusa Province, and it is commonly said that he was a vassal of the Muromachi bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) in Kyoto when he was young.
